title: China : weekly box office revenue November 2019 , by movie
yAxis: Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Hollywood Filmss.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has 35.8 more Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hollywood Films in the x axis and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Hollywood Filmss.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has 35.8 more Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Hollywood Films, and Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Hollywood Films on the y axis.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has the highest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars and Wings Over Everest has the lowest Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Hollywood Films Frozen 2 has 35.8 more Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest.
Hollywood Films Frozen 2 is higher than any other Hollywood Filmss with value 37.3, followed by Two Tigers, and Knives Out. Down to Hollywood Films Wings Over Everest with the lowest value 1.5.
The Hollywood Films Frozen 2 tends to be 4.03 percent higher than average.
The Box office revenue in million U.S. dollars is 92.5 if we add up values of all Hollywood Filmss.
